lst.vn: công tơ nơ, thùng đựng hàng
lst.example: They use container to transport goods.
We had to go through customs before we could leave the airport.

lst.vn: hàng hoá (chở bằng tàu thủy, hoặc đường hàng không)
lst.example: The cargo of the ship got wet when it started raining.
Shoppers complained about poor quality merchandise and high prices.
My company is trying to get an import license.
Coffee is one of Brazil's main exports.
Trade ships only carried valuable freight like silk and spices.
You have to pay a high premium for express delivery.
He is paid a good wage, because he works for a fair employer.
What is the maturity date of this debenture certificate?
She sent me an invoice for $250.
What method of payment do you prefer?
This is your warranty certificate, please keep it carefully.
Parcels should be packed by postal.

lst.vn: cộng thêm; thêm vào; bổ sung

lst.example: I had to use loan to finish 4 years at my university.
When you buy goods or get cash with a debit card, the money is taken from your bank account right away.
